name: Sonia Denis
bio: Sonia is a NYC-based comedian who just relocated from Chicago in August this year. She was recently honored as a Comedy Central 2016 Comic to Watch at the New York Comedy Festival in November. Sonia is currently on tour with her live show “Afrofuturism” in DC and Chicago through the Second City Touring Company. *Attaching an early draft of her pilot DON’T KILL YOURSELF.
